availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, carpenter. Married to Sarah E. Hancock in Henderson County, Kentucky, on December 31, 1846. Father of Robert Brashear, Ella Brashear Gibson, Ben Brashear, and Walter Brashear. Carpenter in Henderson County in 1850. Served on the Henderson City Council in 1854.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Henderson, p. 272B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1890), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Henderson, p.423D.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #000576460, p. 94.
Henry Sinclair Brashear, The Brashear--Brashears Family, 1449-1929 (Texarkana, TX: Henry Sinclair Brashear, 1929), 134, 135.
